name: 4 Double Basses - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 4 Double Basses ensemble. Massive, resonant low end providing orchestral foundation. Deep, powerful tone for cinematic impact.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with sustained - add an articulation change entry, switching to spiccato - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained, then back to short articulation. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble double basses (4 players). CC1 controls dynamics for long articulations. No legato available. Use velocity for short articulations.
